content.description:
Mercatores conveneruntconvenio, -ire, -i: to gather, meet. Priusquam negotium agerent, 
unus illorum adeo iratus locutus est ut reliqui tacerent. 
Ergo nihil negotii actum est.
content.question: In seeking to accomplish goals in a group, the passage implies that

choices.label: speaking openly and passionately is an effective strategy
remaining silent and observing others helps form consensus
failing to control one’s emotions gets nothing accomplished in the end
the fewer the number of people that are involved, the easier it is to accomplish one’s goals

content.answer: failing to control one’s emotions gets nothing accomplished in the end
